name: DownloadGithubWorkflowJobLogs
description:
Retrieve a URL to download GitHub workflow job logs.

Use this tool to get a link for downloading logs of a specific GitHub workflow job. The link is a plain text file URL and expires in 1 minute. Users must have read access to the repository. For private repositories, an access token with 'repo' scope is required, or 'actions:read' permission for GitHub Apps.

parameters.name: repository_owner
parameters.description: The account owner of the GitHub repository. Provide the name in a non-case sensitive format.

value_schema.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: repository_name
parameters.description: The name of the GitHub repository (case insensitive).

value_schema.description: The name of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: workflow_job_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the GitHub workflow job to download logs for.

value_schema.description: The unique identifier of the job.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the GitHub API.

parameters.name: owner
parameters.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: repo
parameters.description: The name of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The name of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: job_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the job.

value_schema.description: The unique identifier of the job.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
